name: Senryu Nights
description:
Senryu Nights

A game about writing senryus or haikus about different scenes.

You can also view the poems written by others around the scene.

Your poems can be uploaded and shared with others anonymously!

Download the Desktop version for the best performance!!!

Follow my twitter for more games in the future

 https://twitter.com/samc0leman

Credits:

Assets used:

Stylized Water Shader (https://alexanderameye.github.io/notes/stylized-water/)

Better Minimal WebGL Template (https://seansleblanc.itch.io/better-minimal-webgl-template)

REST Client For Unity (https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/tools/network/rest-client-for-unity-102501)

Royalty free music & sound effects:

Sweet Sad Afternoon by BubbleBeats (https://soundcloud.com/nocopyrightlofi/no-copyright-chill-lofi-hiphop-sweet-sad-...)

Green Tea by PurrpleCat (https://www.free-stock-music.com/purrple-cat-green-tea.html)

Controller sound effect (http://freesoundstock.blogspot.com/2018/02/ps4-controller-sound-effect.html)

Additional sound effects from https://www.zapsplat.com & https://mixkit.co/
